amendment.description: Amendments require a GAO study on the economic impacts of rounds 1, 2, and 3 of NSP funding.
amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc consisting of amendments 9 and 10 printed in Part B of House Report 112-34.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A009) offered by Ms. Castor (FL).
On agreeing to the Castor (FL) amendments (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
